titles.title: Korean War Veterans Recognition Act of 2006
A bill to amend title 4, United States Code, to add National Korean War Veterans Armistice Day to the list of days on which the flag should especially be displayed.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 7/20/2006--Introduced. Korean War Veterans Recognition Act of 2006 - Adds National Korean War Veterans Armistice Day, July 27, to the list of days on which the flag of the United States should be displayed.
